name: You are bound to the past
name_original: You are bound to the past
description:
First game jam game !!

Your an adventurer who loves visiting dungeons but in this one you find a book that is cursed and you are bound to the author

to break the link you will need to beat the dungeon master to free yourself from this curse

this game is using the  QWERTY keyboard layout

for the music :

"Damiano Baldoni 09 medieval age"  ,  "Syncopika medieval town" and  "The old tower inn"

for the art :

16x16 dungeon tile set from https://0x72.itch.io/

made in collaboration with : 

https://venisher.itch.io/ , https://andrazoth.itch.io/ , https://huadaniel4.itch.io/ , Alexandre Nguyen , Victoria Caufriez and myself
